Joining Our Servers

Welcome in! Click on any server address to copy it to your clipboard. Then, direct connect to us!

Project Zomboid

Joining our Project Zomboid server requires becoming whitelisted, the first step of which is applying for membership on our Discord server. For more information, see the Project Zomboid Connection Guide.
